languages.text: "Ответь на вопрос, Эклендиль. Не ради забавы мон-кай, но ради тех, чьи души растворились в бесконечности".

traits.locale_text: "Ответь на вопрос, Эклендиль. Не ради забавы мон-кай, но ради тех, чьи души растворились в бесконечности".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."
languages.original_text: "Ответь на вопрос, Эклендиль. Не ради забавы мон-кай, но ради тех, чьи души растворились в бесконечности".

traits.locale_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

languages.text: «Responde a la pregunta, Eklendyl. No para complacer {mf|al|a la} mon-keigh, sino por el bien de aquellos cuyas almas se disuelven en el infinito».
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: «Responde a la pregunta, Eklendyl. No para complacer {mf|al|a la} mon-keigh, sino por el bien de aquellos cuyas almas se disuelven en el infinito».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「質問に答えろ、エクレンディル。モン＝ケイの慰みのためではなく、魂が無限の中へ消えていった者たちのためにだ」
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: 「質問に答えろ、エクレンディル。モン＝ケイの慰みのためではなく、魂が無限の中へ消えていった者たちのためにだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “赶紧回答问题，埃克伦迪。这并不是为为了满足猴子的好奇心，而是为了抚慰那些灵魂融入永恒的人。”
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: “赶紧回答问题，埃克伦迪。这并不是为为了满足猴子的好奇心，而是为了抚慰那些灵魂融入永恒的人。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Répondez à la question, Eklendyl. Pas pour l'amusement {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh, mais pour toutes les âmes qui se sont évanouies dans l'infini. »
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: « Répondez à la question, Eklendyl. Pas pour l'amusement {mf|du|de la} mon-keigh, mais pour toutes les âmes qui se sont évanouies dans l'infini. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Beantwortet die Frage, Eklendyl. Nicht zum Vergnügen {mf|des|der} Chem-Pan-Sey, sondern für die, deren Seelen sich in der Unendlichkeit aufgelöst haben."
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: "Beantwortet die Frage, Eklendyl. Nicht zum Vergnügen {mf|des|der} Chem-Pan-Sey, sondern für die, deren Seelen sich in der Unendlichkeit aufgelöst haben."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Soruya cevap ver Eklendyl. Mon-keigh'i mutlu etmek için değil, ruhları ebediyette dağılıp gidenlerin hatırı için cevap ver."
languages.original_text: "Answer the question, Eklendyl. Not for the mon-keigh's amusement but for the sake of those whose souls dissolved in infinity."

traits.locale_text: "Soruya cevap ver Eklendyl. Mon-keigh'i mutlu etmek için değil, ruhları ebediyette dağılıp gidenlerin hatırı için cevap ver."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
